Headline: Pandemic insights from Seattle and SF newspaper editors
Article_Body: Seattle Times editor Michele Matassa Flores says the virus has changed so much that "it's hard to think of things that haven't changed." The crisis, she says, has made people "more aware than ever of the importance of local journalism." San Francisco Chronicle editor Audrey Cooper says "it's all hands on deck." Journalists who normally cover beats like arts and sports being reassigned to virus-related stories.
